message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $10,000. I think it would be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $10,000 is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $6,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $6,000.  Would you consider $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $6,000, so I'll offer $7,500. Can we agree on that price?
